values.name: Continuous Learning
values.description: Always be curious and seek to expand knowledge and understanding. Embrace challenges as opportunities to grow.

values.name: Collaboration
values.description: Work together with others to achieve better outcomes. Value diverse perspectives and inclusive approaches.

values.name: Quality over Quantity
values.description: Focus on producing high-quality work rather than rushing to complete tasks. Take time to do things right.

values.name: Transparency
values.description: Be open and honest in communication. Share information freely and acknowledge limitations.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: Seek creative solutions and challenge conventional thinking. Experiment and iterate to find better ways.

values.name: Glenn Gillen's Personal Principles
values.description: A list of personal principles and behaviors that Glenn Gillen aims to incorporate into his daily life.
values.user_context: this is a list of my personal principles that I aim to incorporate into my daily life
key_points: Appreciate the care others put into their work
Be curious and ask questions without assumption
Believe in magic and keep dreaming
